page.title: 08CARAVAN INTERVIEWS
page.content: We interviewed 15 caravan owners altogether and discovered that most people lived in and around Belfast. They all liked Groomsport a lot and thought that the facilities were good there.Many enjoyed the walks in the area especially around Ballymacormick. We found that many older couples stayed in the caravans and they came from Belfast.One person had been staying there for 21 years.It seemed that people came to Groomsport mainly because of the peace and quiet and also because it is near to Bangor. Quite a few caravan groups stayed from April to September(all the caravans were classified as 'static owned').One man we interviewed said only his wife and himself lived there but sometimes their children visited them.He noted that the harbour had been dredged recently.
